ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR ($Profile.Name ="MMS Sales",$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales Quote",$Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'), $RecordType.Id ="012300000000hQf" || $RecordType.Id ="012500000000ltDAAQ", ISCHANGED( StageName ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not change the stage value if you are a Sales Rep and the opportunity has been submitted to the DSA
